Develop the next generation of innovative apps with HP IDOL OnDemand

Tap into the explosive growth of human information to build next-generation, insights-driven apps using IDOL OnDemand. With IDOL OnDemand, we’re bringing the power of HP IDOL (Intelligent Data Operating Layer), one of the world’s most capable human information processing engines, to the cloud.

Compete in [topcoder] challenges to accelerate time-to-innovation by using IDOL OnDemand web service APIs in your apps to help you engage with human information, including text, images, social media and app data. Fully inquire, investigate, interact with and improve human information to pioneer a new generation of ground-breaking consumer and enterprise apps today.

  • Compete in development challenges for cash & prizes
  • Get up to speed on the latest technology
  • Demonstrate profecieny in HP technologies
  • Enhance your [topcoder] profile with HP badges

Features

Sentiment Analysis

Return the positive or negative sentiments of any document or web content, including tweets, news articles, blog posts, product reviews, comments and more.

Entity Extraction

Extracts entities (words, phrases, or blocks of information) from your input text.

Image Analysis

Analyze images using face detection and image identification. Use image to text to make text accessible and searchable or embed a barcode reader to enrich the functionality of your app.

Format Conversion

Extract text from a wide range of file types. Convert 500+ file formats to HTML for high fidelity native browser rendering.

Text Analysis

Extract, highlight and expand text and metadata, entities, and keywords to automatically discover, organize and classify unstructured information.

Search

Search unstructured information. Extract and highlight keywords.

[topcoder] Challenges & Leaders

[topcoder] is the world’s largest platform for digital open innovation. We provide the platform and community of over 600,000 global members to accelerate the development of new digital products and services for our clients.
